projects.title: 30-Day Federated Learning Security Portfolio
projects.description: A comprehensive 30-project portfolio exploring federated learning security. Features 165,000+ lines of code covering fraud detection, adversarial attacks, defensive mechanisms, and the novel SignGuard defense system.
achievements: 758 Python files, 101 test files, 23 Jupyter notebooks
~165,000 lines of code with 9.6/10 quality score
SignGuard: Multi-layer defense with ECDSA + Anomaly Detection + Reputation

projects.title: privacy-preserving-phishing-detection: 21-Day Federated Phishing Detection
projects.description: A 21-project intensive portfolio focused on privacy-preserving federated phishing detection. Includes production-grade system with 500+ tests, React dashboard, and comprehensive documentation.
achievements: Privacy techniques: HE (CKKS, BFV), TEE (Intel SGX), ZK proofs
Production system with React dashboard and comprehensive API
Privacy-preserving GBDT with HE encryption (69 tests)

projects.title: Production AI Portfolio - 10 Enterprise Projects
projects.description: Enterprise-grade portfolio showcasing production-ready AI systems including RAG applications, LangGraph agents, LLMOps pipelines, and scalable infrastructure.
achievements: RAG Systems (4): Enterprise-RAG (9/10), MultiModal-RAG, DataChat-RAG, fraud-docs-rag
Security score improved from 4→0 critical issues

projects.title: PaperStego: Published Steganography Research
projects.description: Published research on improving steganography imperceptibility using PVD, LSB substitution, and modulo encoding with NIST SP 800-90A CTR_DRBG.
achievements: 7 projects: Proposed method, 2 baselines, 3 experiment frameworks
131 test images × 10 message sizes = 1,310 embedding trials
Evaluated using PSNR, MSE, and SSIM metrics
